description: An improper boundary check in eden_runtime hal service prior to SMR Feb-2022 Release 1 allows arbitrary memory write and code execution.

product.name: Samsung Mobile Devices with Exynos chipsets

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Q(10.0), R(11.0), S(12.0) devices with selected Exynos chipsets <SMR Feb-2022 Release 1
